message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.SD 

This paper is about building explainable systems in Natural Language Processing (NLP) using a generative explanation framework for text classification. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CL (Computation and Language), which deals with the intersection of computer science and linguistics. The paper also proposes a novel approach for learning to generate explanations, which involves machine learning techniques, making cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) another likely sub-category. The paper also uses neural network models, which falls under cs.LG (Machine Learning) and cs.SD (Software Engineering and Programming). Finally, the paper deals with text classification, which is a sub-topic of cs.IR (Information Retrieval).
